import { Component, Input } from '@angular/core'; import { User } from '../user-component/user-model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-user-table', templateUrl: './user-table.component.html', styleUrls: ['./user-table.component.css'] }) export class UserTableComponent { @Input() users!: User[]; constructor() { } }
